name: LoRA Tuymans Style Transfer (Optimized)
description: AI-powered style transfer using LoRA models with Luc Tuymans artistic style. Optimized for RunPod with comprehensive debugging and monitoring.

env.description: Maximum memory usage for AI models
Enable memory optimization for large models
Disable XSRF protection for RunPod compatibility

readme:
# LoRA Tuymans Style Transfer

## Features
- AI-powered style transfer using LoRA models
- Luc Tuymans artistic style
- Modern Streamlit UI
- GPU acceleration
- Comprehensive monitoring and debugging

## Usage
1. Upload your image
2. Select LoRA model (place in /workspace/loras/)
3. Adjust parameters
4. Generate styled image

## Ports
- 8505: Streamlit web interface

## Volumes
- /workspace/loras -> /data/loras (LoRA models)
- /workspace/models -> /data/models (Full models)

## Recommended GPU
- RTX 4000 Ada Generation (20GB VRAM)
- RTX A6000 (48GB VRAM)
- RTX 3090 (24GB VRAM)

## Troubleshooting
Check logs in the terminal for detailed diagnostics.
